body.name: LOAAO 20X28 LED Bathroom Mirror with Lights, Anti-Fog, Dimmable, Backlit + Front Lit, Lighted Bathroom Vanity Mirror for Wall, Memory Function, Tempered Glass, Shatter-Proof, ETL Listed

asinVariationValues.variationValue: Rgb Led Bathroom Mirror (11 Light Modes)

deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 15 hrs 24 mins
features: 【Backlit+Front-lit, Double Lighting Sources】: LOAAO LED bathroom mirror is designed with both backlight and front light. Double lighting sources designed to make the mirror bright enough for you to do makeup, skin care, shaving and dressing up. Super bright.

【Dimmable & 3 Color Temperature】: The brightness is dimmable for this lighted bathroom mirror. By simply long press the touch switch to adjust the brightness. Both backlight and front light could be dimmable. 3 color temperature for option, warm light (3000k), natural light (4000k), and white light (6000k). Waterproof mirror rated for using in the bathroom.

【Defog Feature & Memory Function】: Fogless mirror with defog function, no worry about wiping the mirror down after a shower. The lighted bathroom mirror is already clean. Anti fog starts quick and one hour auto-off. Memory function helps remember the last setting that you’ve used, smart mirror, smart home.

【Easy to Install, Plug-in/Hardwired】: This LOAAO Bathroom Mirror with lights is easy to install packed with all mounting hardware needed for installation. The two sturdy wall brackets on the back of the mirror make sure the mirror hangs securely on wall.The mirror can be hardwired or plugged in. Also easy to clean ( hangs vertically or horizontally).

【Shatter-Proof, Sturdy and Durable】: Different from other mirrors, LOAAO led bathroom mirror is designed with 5MM tempered glass which features shatter-proof, explosion-proof. Sturdy, durable and safe to use. The mirror provide clear reflection with no distortion. Decent mirror built with solid material. Durable to use.

【3-Years-Warranty】: LOAAO mirrors are with 3 years warranty. Anytime you have a question regarding our mirror, please feel free to contact us. Our professional after-sales team will always be there to help you.

【Answers to FAQs】: 1, The blue light can be turned off. Press and hold the anti fog button till the blue light is off. 2, The buttons on the mirror can be used to turn on/off mirror as well as the wall switch and plug. 3, anti fog function can be turn on/off at will. plus one hour auto off features. 4, The mirror can be hanged vertically or horizontally. 5, The mirror is made of tempered glass, which is shatter-proof, explosion-proof, safe to use. Better quality and more durable, waterproof.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars it is absolutely beautiful
reviews.reviewText: TL;DR stunning, durable, well packaged, works as expected, defogger doesnt cover 100% of mirror,Install:1st, im an electrician so powering the mirror was simple for me. All it needs is a standard plug. I actually installed a recessed outlet (aka clock outlet) so the mirror and sit more flush on the wall. BUT! they out-smarted me! and the mirror was built with a 90degree flat plug so it already sits flush against the wall! so no need for an special outlet, just a basic one works perfectly fine (keep in mind tho, if its going in a bathroom the outlet should be gfci protected per electrical code and general safety)It came with 2 mounting brackets (Z brackets) made of metal that are fastest to the wall with 2 screws each. also came with screws and drywall anchors. but throw away the anchors and screw it directly into the stud with some construction screws or lag screws (not drywall screws!) the mirror lays into the brackets and you may have to push down on the mirror a little bit to feel/hear it set in place, it doesnt have to be perfect the first time the mirror will slide of the brackets with a solid push.and thats it. super simple install.Controls:the touch buttons work perfectly, I was wearing nitrile gloves and they work with those on. (it came with white gloves too, but i didnt notice until after install)When the controls are blue, that means its off.when the main light is off, a long press and hold does something, I think locks the light off.long press and hold with the lights on is the dimming function.short press, cycles thru the light settings.I dont remember if the mirror has a memory setting, as in itll go back to its last setting after its been turned off. I think the RGBs do, but not the mirror light.Defogger:it works better than others ive had in the past, its super fast and does a really good job.BUT! it does not do the entire light, I got the 55x30 and it does the center about 24x12 ish inches worth, its enough to be usable, so not really a complaint.RGBsI leave it on the chasing effect even as a night light, its very calming to me personally. if you stare long enough you'll see each individual led. its really not a problem nor a design flaw, ive just been spoiled by my job to see perfectly uniform smooth leds without the led itself being noticable. the rgbs also dim, thats pretty rad.main light:there are 3 color temps: white, yellow, and more white. personally I can't really tell the difference between the 2 whites, but I think thats cuz of the order it cycles thru the colors so its hard to compare. either way its a nice white that really shows how handsome or ugly i am that day.Cleaning:Ive only had it for a few days so haven't needed to clean it just yet, but I suspect itll be just as any other light.what i have noticed is, it doesn't seem to collect fingerprints that much. so thats huge!Packaging:this thing was well protected. It even had big thick rub conor guards on it! totally keeping those for future use for anything. the front and back had a layer of foam along with foam around the edges.I absolutely love it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Ok WOW!!! The mirror look amazing. With the lights Off or on. It not as heavy once out of the box.It took only about 15 minutes to install and adds another great addition to our bathroom. I ordered two one for each of my bathrooms. Only installed one so far. The other bathroom is being remodeled.The price was great at $229.00 on sale from $309.00. Worth every penny. The switches built into the mirror have a soft blue glow and almost acts as a night light while off.If you thinking about getting one, get it! It will add a little elegance to your bathroom.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Looks amazing and totally worth the money!
reviews.reviewText: I can’t speak on the longevity of the mirror but i can however speak on the quality in which it was received, how it looks, and how install went.I was nervous when it was shipped out from the company as it is a big glass mirror and you never know how companies are going to pack a product (especially a mirror). It had bulky rubber bumpers on all 4 corners and styrofoam molds all around the face and corners of the mirror and it was in perfect condition upon delivery.I love how it has made our bathroom look a bit more updated vs the typical glue-on-the-wall mirror that most builders use in homes. All the colors look amazing and the lights are very responsive!Install was as easy as measure, drill 4 holes, shove in drywall anchors, screw 4 bolts into the 2 brackets, pick it up and lay it on the tracks. EXTREMELY SIMPLE AND ANYBODY SHOULD BE ABLE TO INSTALL THIS IN 30 MINUTES TOPS!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice mirror light combo
reviews.reviewText: Got the 36 by 36 mirror. Looks awesome in my bathroom. Installation was easy for me. Directions were a little confusing. No explanation of the steps just pictures. The RGB backlit light is cool with the different colors. Well made and just a nice piece.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Mirror looks great!
reviews.reviewText: My only complaint is the height of the mirror. It’s 30” and I would’ve preferred a taller 40” or at least close to 40”. Despite all this, it is a great mirror. I’m still installing in the vanity area so I haven’t removed the plastic from the mirror. However, i did peak and it’s a very clear mirror. The on off work seamlessly. It transitioned through colors well and the backlight is really nice.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So far it’s great!!
reviews.reviewText: Well packaged, super fast delivery and an ease to install (I hardwired it). The touch controls are sensitive and easy to figure out. I had gone with another brand that had issues. The only slight quality issue is the holes drilled into the wall mounts are haphazard. Not enough to outweigh all the great features. It is bright enough to be highly functional! It really livened up my main bathroom (along w a floating vanity). Towels bars being changed out as we speak.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Ordered this after researching for several days. The mirror arrived in 3 days! It looks gorgeous! We wired it up to a switched outlet. The mirror has enough space behind it that a recessed outlet is not necessary, the plug is a right angle plug. I like that the front and rear lights are controlled independently by two separate buttons- I don’t think their plain white light model has this feature. Both front and rear lights can be dimmed. The front light is only the three shades of white. The mirror is fairly bright but we will need to add several more lights in a 6x12’ bathroom. I don’t like that the defogger comes on automatically every time the wall switch is turned on-the manufacturer should change this to default off as the defogger is only used when showering. We will most likely need to leave the wall switch on 24/7 to alleviate this, but a wall switch gives that flexibility. The 3 blue lights make a good bathroom nightlight. It is not terribly heavy to install but is very awkward trying to hang it two feet in front of your body over a vanity and requires two people. I wish it had a clock feature. LOAAO did many things right on this mirror and we love it.
